title: Adelaide high school moves to online learning over coronavirus concerns
description: One of South Australia's largest public schools, Unley High School, has announced it is moving learning online for the reminder of the term.
content:
Updated 
March 24, 2020 13:05:38
One of South Australia's largest public schools, Unley High School, has announced it is moving learning online for the reminder of the term.
